Class SplashScreen

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              javax.swing.JWindow
                  de.xeinfach.kafenio.SplashScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class SplashScreen
extends javax.swing.JWindow
implements java.lang.Runnable

Class that displays a splash screen Is run in a separate thread so that the applet continues to load in the background

Author:
Karsten Pawlik
